name: Bullet Hell Reverence 1.0
description:
Bullet Hell Reverence is a Mecha game system, that is both new and provides plenty of variety of role-playing. From creating your own Mecha, to creating your own weapons, to other things. Sure, it isn't anything too fancy, but it's something I can call my own. I'm always willing to take feedback. This is just something fun for everyone to do. 

Of course, later down the line I'll probably update and add some things later on in the years. Let me know. I'm always willing to improve my stuff. :)

(The Cover Image is not mine. Credit goes to the owner who made it.)
